review: I had this medication as an IV infusion while hospitalized for a severe UTI and kidney infection. The only symptom I had was major diarrhea. Often, I couldnâ€™t even make it out of the bed in time and my stool had a strange, strong smell. Even for days after stopping the treatment. I suggest taking a probiotic with it.
After taking the zosyn for 10 days I could hardly hear.  It has improved somewhat but not like it was prior to taking the medication.

During my hospital stay I went through numerous antibiotics all of which made me sick until Zosyn took only a few mins to go through my body and made me feel almost completely normal. I absolutely loved it.
